points.description: Observation: IHA metrics and R-B flashiness near reference; no increase in low/zero-flow days. Criteria: Timing, magnitude, pulse frequency, and rise/fall rates within reference ranges; stable-flow windows intact.
Observation: One or two IHA groups show modest departure; R-B slightly higher. Criteria: Small shifts in timing or pulse frequency; low-flow days increase only slightly.
Observation: Several IHA components and R-B show clear departure. Criteria: More frequent surges, shorter stable-flow periods, and noticeable increases in low or zero-flow days.
Observation: Most IHA metrics outside reference; R-B much higher. Criteria: Seasonal timing lost or shifted; extended low-flow or dry periods change expected flow duration class.
